page.title: 12Social Life in Heolgerrig.
page.content: In Heolgerrig there is one club and two pubs. Many people attend this club just to drink, and have a game of snooker or darts.The one thing that the club has which is very useful is the hall. This is used when there are discos and parties held.The two pubs are just drinking places. The other main built up area in our block is Clwydyfagwr which is half a mile North West of Heolgerrig.There is one public house,this has only just been built.It is called the Twyncarmel Inn.Also there is another pub on Swansea Road called the Harp Inn,this has a lounge where you can have a meal, and is useful for people living in the Gellideg area.
